item.title: Test Automation with Python
item.description:
This project was developed for the CI/CD course as part of the official university master’s degree in Development and Operations (DevOps). The main objective of this project is to carry out the development of unit and API test automation of a given Calculator program. GitHub repository: https://github.com/aleingmar/automatic-tests-python

Project report:

Project documentation: View documentation in pdf
